page.title: 12CHANGES IN PARTNEY
page.content: We intervieawed Miss Maddison In Partney the roads have changed a lot.Since Miss Maddison was young. When she was little the roads were very rough and people rode horses and traps. She has lived in Partney all her life except for a short time in the War when she went to Spilsby with her family.The church had 3 sevices each Sunday at 8:00 to 12:00 and 6:00 Miss Maddison is a church warden.She is responsible for the church and every thing in it. Maddison Lane was named after her farther because he helped the council.When she was a little girl the sheep fair was held 3 times a year and there were a lot less sheep. The village hall was built in 1920 and there were bakery shops an ordinary shop and another pub.
